data.md:MetaData: Tree-ring chronology of Larix gmelinii (Dahurian larch) compiled from tree samples OLENJOLA
Exposition W, Slope 3 deg, Geology: Moräne, Kalk, av. Tree height 14 m, Tree cover 30%, Shrub cover 25%, Herb cover 75%, Moss cover 95%, Vegatation type: Dryas-Lärchen-Wald, Film number: 899A
